title: TechnologyApr 12, 2025WhatsApp down: Major outage hits messaging services globallyWhatsApp is currently experiencing a widespread disruption, impacting numerous users globally. Reports indicate that individuals are facing difficulties with sending messages, establishing connections, and utilizing call functionalities on both the mobile application and the web-based platform. Downdetector has registered a surge in user complaints, with a significant portion reporting issues specifically related to message transmission.

TechnologyApr 12, 2025Donald Trump just gave Samsung a 'huge problem' and it is called VietnamUS President Trump's tariff hikes on Vietnamese exports, now at 46%, pose a significant challenge for Samsung Electronics, disrupting its global supply chain. With 60% of Samsung's smartphone production based in Vietnam, the company faces vulnerabilities due to the trade tensions. Samsung is exploring alternative production strategies in India or South Korea.
